TopicTitle: Is there a mod which allows multiple computers to get flight data from KSP?

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I've got a bunch of friends who play KSP and we were wondering if it were possible to play a mission-control-style multiplayer. Basically, one of us would be a pilot (running ksp on their computer) and would only play in IVA, while the rest of us are monitoring various stats (altitude, delta v, orbital charts, etc.) on our own computers and relaying commands to the pilot.

I remember that, at some point, there was a mod that had such readouts by hosting a local website that could be opened in browser on many computers on the same network, but that was a while ago and I've forgotten what it's called, or even if it exists anymore. Do any of you have suggestions?

Thanks!

The one that comes to mind is Telemachus, which I think is the one you are thinking of. No idea if its still maintained.

Sounds like a cool idea though! Good luck with it if it gets started.
That's the one! Thanks a bunch!
